Uses of Class
Nim.Pile

    • Uses of Pile in Nim

      Constructors in Nim with parameters of type Pile 
      Constructor and Description
      Nim(Player player1, Player player2, Pile pile)
      Constructs a game of Nim -- FOR HUMAN PLAYER(S): please pass human player to player1 (will still prompt if player wants to go first) but for player2, pass the human.request() method; if BOTH player1 AND player2 are AI, player1 plays first automatically;
